body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth      Be a Junior Ranger!Hey kids!  Want to learn more about Cabrillo National Monument, and earn a cool badge?  Find out more on our Junior Ranger page.   Â    Recipe for Hardtack One of the essential foods that Cabrillo brought along for the voyage was the notorious biscuit called hardtack. You can download a recipe that you can make at home.
title: Cabrillo National Monument: Kids & Youth
